description: three seated figures and one standing figure, all looking toward left; frontmost figure seated on a bench
medium: Pen and brown ink with brown wash on paper laid down on board
provenance: Sir Joshua Reynolds, Lugt 2364 (1723-1792), London. John and Alice Steiner, Larchmont, N.Y. (1972-87; gave, as by Francesco Allegrini or his circle, to Moir); Alfred Moir, Santa Barbara (1987-d. 2010; bequeathed to MIA)
title: Figures Seated Around a Table
